trans-unit.source: Represents a `<KeyIndentifier>` element that references a `<saml:Assertion>` element in a SOAP message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified SAML assertion identifier.
Pass the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> to this constructor.
The identifier of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier
assertionId is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified SAML assertion identifier, nonce, and key length.
Pass the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> to this constructor.
The `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are ignored when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause> class is serialized into an outgoing SOAP message.
The identifier of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
The size of the derived key.
assertionId is `null`.
Gets the identifier for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
The identifier for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> is specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.AssertionId%2A> property.
The identifier for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the key identifier.
Determines whether the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance.
This <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.Matches%2A> overload returns a value of `true` when either of the following is `true`:

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter has the same value as the current instance's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause.AssertionId%2A> property.
The `keyIdentifierClause` parameter and this instance are the same instance.
`true` when the specified key identifier is the same as the current instance; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether the specified SAML assertion identifier is the same as the current instance.
The comparison is case sensitive.
The SAML assertion identifier to be compared.
`true` when assertionId has the same value as the current instance's property; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that includes the SAML assertion identifier that represents the current key identifier clause.

A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that includes the SAML assertion identifier that represents the current <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> instance.
